data.name: Sweep
data.detailed_description:
History.

Go through the path of a desperate man who got into a criminal peripeteia and can only go to drastic measures to achieve his own results. Learn about the lives of ordinary people and people related to the criminal business in Russia in the 90s.

Sweeper's difficulties.

You will have to think carefully about your actions while completing job, because if you make even one mistake, you will have to start from the beginning. You are given complete freedom of action, do what you want and pass in any style, the main thing is to get rid of everyone.

Use your abilities.

Before starting a new task, you can choose which ability or starting equipment you will go with. You will have to think about your choice based on the information provided, your own intuition, and your preferred fighting style.

RTX support.

The game includes ray tracing support from NVidia. If you have a RTX series graphics card, you will be able to play with ray tracing. If not, you can still play but without ray tracing.

Enjoy the music.

The soundtrack for the game was written by electronic music composer Fly5olo. He wrote all the tracks in his signature and unique style. If you are a fan of such genres of music as: techno, drum&bass и dubstep then you gonna like the soundtrack to this game.

data.short_description: There are two light paths in 90s Russia - go abroad or become a criminal. In Sweep you'll follow the second one. You will take part in a dark criminal story, in which the main character of the game Sergey is.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750 TI or Radeon R7 370 - 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12

content_descriptors.notes: Game have scenes with violence and blood.
